This article presents lists of literary events and publications in the 16th century. 1501 1502 1507 1508 1509 1510 1510–1511 1512 1513 1514 1515 1516 1519 1521 1522 1522–24 1524 1526 1530 1533 1534 1535 1536 1537 1538 1539 1540 1541 1542 1550 1551 1552 1554 1565 1567 1571 1572 1575 1576 1586 1590 1596 1597 1598 1599 1500 1501 1502 1503 1505 1508 1509 1510 1511 1512 1513 1514–15 1516 1517 1518 1519 1520 1521 1522 1523 1524 1525 1526 1527 1528 1530 1531 1532 1533 1534 1535 1536 1538 1539 1540 1541 1542 1543 1544 1545 1546 1547 1548 1549 1550 1552 1553 1554 1559 1560 1562 1563 1564 1565 1567 1569 1571 1572 1576 1577 1578 1579 1581 1582 1583 1584 1585 1586 1588 1590 1592 1594 1595 1596 1597 1598 1599 1502 1504 1508 1509 1513 1517 1522 1523 1524 1525 1531 1536 1538 1541 1551 1553 1562 1566 1567 1568 1573 1582 1584 1588 1589 1590 1591 1592 1594 1595 1597 1598 1599 1505 1514 1516 1527 1528 1530 By 1534 1550 1557 1562 1563 1567 1572 1573 1575 1576 1577 1579 1581 1582 1590 1591 1592 1593 1594 1595 1596 1597 1598 1599
